description:
沪江英乐：英国小燕子 Lily Allen 最新单曲《Sheezus》！不停变幻的色调充斥着老式B级片效果，Katy Perry、Queen Bee、Gaga，听听艾伦都在里面说了什么？这是要念叨着让他们集体做噩梦的节奏啊。

【Lily Allen 最新单曲《Sheezus》】

歌词：

[Verse 1]
Been here before, so I'm prepared
Not gonna lie though, I'm kinda scared
Lace up my gloves, I'm going in
Don't let my kids watch me when I get in the ring
I'll take the hits, roll with the punches
I'll get back up, it's not as if I've never done this
But then again, the game is changing
Can't just come back, jump on the mic and do the same thing
There goes the bell, I know that sound
I guess it's time for me to go another round
Now wish me luck, I'm gonna need it
I'll see you on the other side, if I'm still breathing

[Chorus]
RiRi isn't scared of Katy Perry's roaring
Queen B's going back to the drawing
Lorde smells blood, yeah, she's about to slay you
Kid ain't one to fuck with when she's only on her debut
We're all watching Gaga, L-O-L-O, ah-ha
Dying for the art so, really, she's a martyr
The second best will never cut it for the divas
Give me that crown, bitch
I wanna be Sheezus

[Verse 2]
I'm ready for all the comparisons
I think it's dumb and it's embarrassing
I'm switching off, no longer listening
I've had enough of persecution and conditioning
Maybe it's an instinct, we're only animal
Maybe it's healthy, maybe it's rational
It makes me angry, I'm serious
But then again, I'm just about to get my period
Periods, we all get periods
Every month, yo, that's what the theory is
It's human nature, another cycle
Be nice to me, I'll make you one of my disciples

[Chorus]
RiRi isn't scared of Katy Perry's roaring
Queen B's going back to the drawing
Lorde smells blood, yeah, she's about to slay you
Kid ain't one to fuck with when she's only on her debut
We're all watching Gaga, L-O-L-O, ah-ha
Dying for the art so, really, she's a martyr
The second best will never cut it for the divas
Give me that crown, bitch
I wanna be Sheezus

[Bridge]
I am born again, now run along and tell
All your friends to come and join us
Give yourselves to me, I am your leader
"Let me be Sheezus"
"Let me be Sheezus"

I am born again, now run along and tell
All your friends to come and join us
Give yourselves to me, I am your leader
"Let me be Sheezus"
"Let me be Sheezus"

title: Lily Allen 最新单曲《Sheezus》

description:
Men and women might wax lyrical about looking for someone who is kind, sensitive and funny. But a new study shows that when it comes to finding partners, the dreaded cliché seems to be true. 无论男女都有可能诗意地幻想自己的另一半是一个善良、敏感而幽默的人。但一项最新研究发现：当人们在真正寻找另一半时，现实似乎又一次验证了那些可怕的陈词滥调。

A study published in the Journal of Evolution and Human behaviour shows what really matters to men is looks - while women want a man with a booming bank balance.The study asked hundreds of young men and women what mattered when choosing a partner. The categories were attractiveness, wealth, ambition, kindness and intelligence.在《进化与人类行为》上刊登的一则调查研究显示：男人择偶的关键是外表，而对于女人来说则更想要一个有钱人。这次调查面对几百个年轻男女发起，询问他们哪些因素可能影响他们对伴侣的选择，结果包括了以下几类：吸引力、财富、事业心、善良和聪明。

And results shows men were overwhelmingly swayed by an attractive face and body, while women were hooked on wealth and ambition.调查结果显示，压倒性数量的男人都会被漂亮的脸蛋和身材所吸引，而对于女人来说她们则更关注男人的金钱和事业心。

Professor Gad Saad, who co-authored the study with Tripat Gill, said the research seems to highlight how evolution has led us to this 'irrational' decision-making.嘉德·萨阿德教授和特里帕特·吉尔合作完成此项研究，称这一研究正反映了自然演化是如何引领我们做出这种看似“荒谬”的决定的。

Mr Saad said: 'Choosing someone who might be a poor provider or an unloving father would have serious consequences for a woman and for her offspring.'萨阿德教授说：“选择一个穷困潦倒的人来养家糊口或者一个缺乏爱心的父亲，势必会对这个女人和她的孩子的生活造成严重的影响。”

The survey, carried out at Concordia University in Montral, Quebec, Canada, gave overall descriptions of potential partners, along with positive and negative descriptions.本次调查在加拿大魁北克省蒙特利尔市的肯高迪亚大学进行，调查的内容是对你所期待的伴侣进行全面的描述，包括正面和负面双重描述。

It showed that an attractive body and an attractive face were seen as more important to men, while earning potential and ambition were more important to women. Both said kindness and intelligence were equally important to both.调查显示长相和身材迷人对于男人择偶似乎更为重要，而对女人而言她们更在乎男人的收入潜力和事业心。然而无论男女都认为善良、聪明和以上两点同等重要。

【说明】本文由沪江论坛翻译社供稿，想要和小伙伴一起学习讨论进步？戳我加入翻译社吧>>>

title: 择偶时男女看重什么？男看长相女重金钱

description:
沪江小编：2014年上半年BEC备考开始：在备考期间，学员们可能会产生很多困惑，比如考试时听力材料如何播放？口试如何评分？阅读需要多少词汇量？写作模板如何运用？答题卡如何填写？沪江小编汇总了备考时学员中出现的常见问题，并做出简单的指导。本文将解答BEC口试评分标准和细则，并以实例来说明分数级别。

本文为沪江英语原创，转载请注明来源

BEC考试的口试部分相对于其它英语考试来说是比较特别的，很多考生也相当关注口试的评分细则。今天我们就来解开BEC口试的面纱，给大家来列出口试评分规则和标准。

【BEC口试评分规则】

口试共分为三部分，第一和第二部分共有3个评分项目，第三部分有4个评分项目，共10项。每个项目的分数分为：1分、2分、3分(及格)、4分、5分。

具体请看下面给出的例子：

分数说明：

1. 以上是一位考官评出的分数，每个部分会算出一个平均分，最后将三个部分的平均分再相加平均一次。如上图，则考官1给出的分数是3.83分；

2. 考生的总成绩是两位考官分数的平均值，假设考官2给出的分数是4.17，则该考生的最终得分是(3.83+4.17)/2=4分；

3. 由于BEC考试听说读写四个部分分别占总分25%，即25分，最后需要换算一下。口试部分的满分是5分，换算之后就是4/5x25=20分。

【评分项目内容和及格要求】

Pronunciation：发音，不要求非常标准，要求考官能听懂
Grammar&Vocabulary：语法词汇，用词准确、没有或较少出现语法错误
Discourse Management：上下文连接畅顺、逻辑合理
Cooperative Management：不独占对话机会，给搭档发挥空间

达到以上要求可以得3分，在此基础上有更好的发挥和表现则可以获得4分或者5分。反之没有达到基本要求的话只能得到1分、2分。

建议考生放松心态，这样更有助于发挥，第三部分注意一定要给搭档发言的机会，不要只顾着自己说，否则合作这项的分数就会偏低。

更多BEC备考答疑信息，请关注BEC备考答疑专题>>>
